game.name: DCS: F/A-18C Operation Green Line by Badger633
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, 캡션 이용 가능, VR 지원, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 레벨 에디터 포함
game.shortDescription: This campaign is based on fictitious events and follows on from ‘Ford’ and ‘Matrix’s’ exploits in the Straits of Hormuz on board the USS Abraham Lincoln in the “Rise of the Persian Lion II” Campaign.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This campaign is based on fictitious events and follows on from ‘Ford’ and ‘Matrix’s’ exploits in the Straits of Hormuz on board the USS Abraham Lincoln in the “Rise of the Persian Lion II” Campaign.
